Text: sadly, this version does not work on mountain lion. seems legit otherwise
Does not work on Snow Leopard either. Keeps saying is already patched but will not accept keygen's key. I followed the instructions as written

For me Divvy worked. Currently I run OS X Mountain Lion. 

You first have to download XQuartz, but during the installation of Divvy this wil appear in your screen.

Really nice tool. Can't work without it anymore.
